choices.A: Work longer hours to complete more of the support backlog
choices.D: Add members to the support team

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Place tickets on hold until the team completes an analysis of the backlog to identify and resolve systematic issues.

By analyzing the backlog to identify and resolve systematic issues, the team can focus on activities that deliver the most value, such as fixing root causes rather than just addressing symptoms. This aligns with the manager's directive to "work smart" and can lead to a more sustainable and efficient way of handling the support load.
